Params: {2: 'Bianca', 3: 'You are my faith, I follow your will and walk the path you pave.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Please will you listen to your pious believer's prayers..."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'And save this church, save all your children here awaiting your help...'}
{2: 'Commotion', 3: 'Open your eyes! Look where we are!'}
{2: 'Commotion', 3: "We're stuck in here! Yet anybody is going to save us?"}
{2: 'Commotion', 3: "If there wasn't this church... we were all dead!"}
{2: 'Commotion', 3: 'With the blizzard outside, and the mad mechanical monsters everywhere...'}
{2: 'Commotion', 3: 'How can we get out of here!'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '...I know I am a sinner who needs your forgiveness.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'But I, Bianca, will be willing to give my life for this.'}
